about_the_game:
Team and Individual Online PvP 2-8 players (with semi-sentient bots also available)

GAME MODES

  • Capture The Flag
  • Last Man Standing
  • Last Team Standing
  • Paint The Town (territorial)
  • Paint The Town Teams

MECHANICS

  • 3rd person view (lay bombs)
  • 1st person view (fire rockets)
  • Bombs explode and chain to the rhythm of the music
  • Throw & kick bombs
  • Bigger explosions
  • Airstrike
  • Jetpack
  • Kamikaze
  • Invulnerability
  • Invisibility
  • Flash
  • Speedups
  • Debuff your opponents with strategically placed noxious gas

LEVEL EDITOR

  • Create your own levels and play them with friends / enemies over the interwebzen
  • Conveyorbelts
  • Deadly spikes
  • Volcanic eruptions
  • and more...

THE STORY SO FAR...

You are the chosen one, along with 8 billion other ones who have also been chosen - handpicked if you will. Are you up to the task of saving the planet? Or not saving the planet and leaving a trail of mayhem and destruction in your path (more fun)?

There will be blood! (or not if you turn it off in settings)

TESTIMONIALS

  • '5th best seagull cameo in a video game' - Luton Game Festival Awards
  • 'The walks are a bit silly' - The Right Honourable Minister of Silly Walks
  • 'The 3D fart particle physics cannot be explained by conventional means' - 9/10 Scientists

A FINAL NOTE


"Don't shoot the seagull. He's nice." - Chadwick, The Seagull

short_description: A not-so-serious local and online multiplayer game with 1st and 3rd person mechanics set in the classic Bomberman style. Bombs, rocket launchers, jetpacks, CTF, crazy rhythmic elements and much more. Includes 5 competitive game modes and a level editor for infinite replayability.
